title: Tfw Zed players.
body:
*all of this is said in all chat*
"GET OUTPLAYED SCRUB."
"outplayed."
"juked lel."
"gitgud scrub."
"lrn2outplay."
"rekt."
"can't beat a pro Zed lel."
"OUTPLAYEEEEEEEEEED."

For fucks sake, it's like the second they juke (WHICH IS WHAT THIS CHAMPION EXCELS AT) their ego inflates to a balloon and once they pull off the typical Zed combo and get a kill they're suddenly this pro Zed master that everyone should bow down to.

...

Why is the player base for Zed this way?

I've only met like 5 Zed players that were actually nice and not a bunch of arrogant bastards spamming the all chat because they think they're some kind of wizard.

It's just making me ask "Why?" because whenever I see a Zed player I know for sure they're going to be spamming that all chat about how my team camped him or how he's some professional, etc.
